body:
Acceptance Criteria:
- [ ] On token death, one-turn toast appears; dismissible.
- [ ] Clicking toast recenters camera on last token position.
title: Basic notifications (toast)

body:
Acceptance Criteria:
- [ ] Move costs 1 MP; token updates atomically per step.
- [ ] After moving, mine surface value v and add to MP.
- [ ] If MP ≤ 0 after mining, token is removed.
- [ ] Edge: MP=1 → step onto +2 → survives with MP=2.
- [ ] Edge: MP=1 → step onto 0 → dies end of turn.
title: Token movement + mining + death

body:
Acceptance Criteria:
- [ ] Tiles within vision radius are revealed; others fogged.
- [ ] Token tile always revealed.
- [ ] Reveal updates immediately after movement.
title: Fog of war (surface-only)

body:
Acceptance Criteria:
- [ ] Smooth pan (mouse/touch) and bounded to map.
- [ ] Wheel/pinch zoom with min/max limits.
- [ ] UI text remains readable across zoom levels.
title: Camera pan/zoom

body:
Acceptance Criteria:
- [ ] Deterministic seed input yields identical maps.
- [ ] Land/sea mask via low-frequency noise; archipelago belt near coasts.
- [ ] Movement values quantized/clamped (−3…+3 with 1 neutral).
- [ ] 60×60 map renders ≤ 100ms on typical laptop.
title: Seeded map generation (continents, lakes, archipelagoes)

body:
Acceptance Criteria:
- [ ] Tile renders value glyph + texture; center not obscured.
- [ ] Colorblind-safe textures: negative=cross-hatch, neutral=dots, positive=chevrons.
- [ ] Selection/hover states visible at multiple zoom levels.
- [ ] Tile info panel shows movement value for selected tile.
title: Hex tile component (render + accessibility)
